org.jbiowhpersistence.utils.search

Interface JBioWHSearch

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SearchCOG, SearchDrugBank, SearchGeneBank, SearchGeneInfo, SearchGenePTT, SearchKEGGCompound, SearchKEGGEnzyme, SearchKEGGGene, SearchKEGGGlycan, SearchKEGGPathway, SearchKEGGReaction, SearchOMIM, SearchOntology, SearchOrthoXML, SearchPFam, SearchPirsf, SearchProtein, SearchTaxonomy, SearchUniRef

    public interface JBioWHSearch
    This interface is to search over the datasets $Author$ $LastChangedDate$ $LastChangedRevision$
    Since:
    Nov 9, 2013

    • Method Detail

      • search

        List search(String search,
          org.jbiowhcore.utility.constrains.JPLConstrains constrains)
            throws SQLException
        Perform the search
        Parameters:
        search - The search string
        constrains - The JPLConstrains object to be used in the search
        Returns:
        a List object with the result obtained
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • search

        List search(List search,
          org.jbiowhcore.utility.constrains.JPLConstrains constrains)
            throws SQLException
        Perform the search
        Parameters:
        search - is a List object with the internal list has 4 elements. The first element is the logical operator to link with the previous condition (empty string for the first list). The second element is the FIELD on the DataSet to be used to compare. The third element is the operator to compare. The fourth element is the string to be searched.
        constrains - the JPLConstrains object to be used in the search
        Returns:
        a List object with the result obtained
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • searchByWID

        List searchByWID(long WID,
               Class entity)
        Search Entity by WID
        Parameters:
        WID - The entity WID
        entity - The entity class to be used
        Returns:
        a List of entities object with the search result

        Parameters:

        entity - The entity class to be used
        Returns:
        a List of entities object with the search result
